data.name: CellProperties
desc: contains the properties of a table cell.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

types.name: CellInteropGrabBag
desc: Grab bag of cell properties, used as a string-any map for interim interop purposes.
This property is intentionally not handled by the ODF filter. Any member that should be handled there should be first moved out from this grab bag to a separate property.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: AsianVerticalMode
desc: selects Asian character orientation in vertical orientation.

If the CellProperties.Orientation property is CellOrientation.STACKED, in Asian mode only Asian characters are printed in horizontal orientation instead of all characters. For other values of CellProperties.Orientation, this value is not used.

properties.name: BottomBorder
desc: contains a description of the bottom border line of each cell.

properties.name: BottomBorder2
desc: contains a description of the bottom border line of each cell.
Preferred over BorderLine BottomBorder.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: CellBackColor
desc: contains the cell background color.

properties.name: CellProtection
desc: contains a description of the cell protection.
Cell protection is active only if the sheet is protected.

properties.name: CellStyle
desc: contains the name of the style of the cell.

properties.name: DiagonalBLTR
desc: contains a description of the bottom left to top right diagonal line of each cell.

properties.name: DiagonalBLTR2
desc: contains a description of the bottom left to top right diagonal line of each cell.
Preferred over BorderLine DiagonalBLTR.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: DiagonalTLBR
desc: contains a description of the top left to bottom right diagonal line of each cell.

properties.name: DiagonalTLBR2
desc: contains a description of the top left to bottom right diagonal line of each cell.
Preferred over BorderLine DiagonalTLBR.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: HoriJustify
desc: contains the horizontal alignment of the cell contents.

properties.name: IsCellBackgroundTransparent
desc: is TRUE, if the cell background is transparent.
In this case the CellProperties.CellBackColor value is not used.

properties.name: IsTextWrapped
desc: is TRUE, if text in the cells will be wrapped automatically at the right border.

properties.name: LeftBorder
desc: contains a description of the left border line of each cell.

properties.name: LeftBorder2
desc: contains a description of the left border line of each cell.
Preferred over BorderLine LeftBorder.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: NumberFormat
desc: contains the index of the number format that is used in the cells.
The proper value can be determined by using the com.sun.star.util.NumberFormatter interface of the document.

properties.name: Orientation
desc: contains the orientation of the cell contents.
If the CellProperties.RotateAngle property is non-zero, this value is not used.

properties.name: ParaIndent
desc: defines the indentation of the cell contents (in 1/100 mm).

properties.name: RightBorder
desc: contains a description of the right border line of each cell.

properties.name: RightBorder2
desc: contains a description of the right border line of each cell.
Preferred over BorderLine RightBorder.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: RotateAngle
desc: defines how much the content of cells is rotated (in 1/100 degrees).

properties.name: RotateReference
desc: defines at which edge rotated cells are aligned.
changed from com.sun.star.table.CellVertJustify to long in LibO 3.5

properties.name: ShadowFormat
desc: contains a description of the shadow.

properties.name: ShrinkToFit
desc: is TRUE, if the cell content will be shrunk to fit in the cell.

properties.name: TableBorder
desc: contains a description of the cell or cell range border.
If used with a cell range, the top, left, right, and bottom lines are at the edges of the entire range, not at the edges of the individual cell.

properties.name: TableBorder2
desc: contains a description of the cell or cell range border.
Preferred over TableBorder TableBorder.
If used with a cell range, the top, left, right, and bottom lines are at the edges of the entire range, not at the edges of the individual cell.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: TopBorder
desc: contains a description of the top border line of each cell.

properties.name: TopBorder2
desc: contains a description of the top border line of each cell.
Preferred over BorderLine TopBorder.
**since**
LibreOffice 3.6

properties.name: UserDefinedAttributes
desc: stores additional attributes.
This property is used i.e. by the XML filters to load and restore unknown attributes.

properties.name: VertJustify
desc: contains the vertical alignment of the cell contents.
changed from com.sun.star.table.CellVertJustify to long in LibO 3.5
